#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
            int a[]={1,2,3,4,5};
            int j,i=0;
            //Block 1 starts here
            for(j=5;j>0;--j )
            {
                        printf("%d",*(a+i));
                        i++;
            }
            //Block 1 ends here
            return (0);
}
